about_the_game:
The Steam Games Festival demo for Renaine! A fast paced platformer inspired by fighting games, pull stylish combos as you guide Aine, the Phoenix Knight, on her eternal quest to save the cute and colorful world of Lineria!

This demo includes a part of the first world, the Shellwood Forest. Explore the town, collect 10 emblems, find countless secrets, and fight some peculiar bosses. Have fun!
detailed_description:
The Steam Games Festival demo for Renaine! A fast paced platformer inspired by fighting games, pull stylish combos as you guide Aine, the Phoenix Knight, on her eternal quest to save the cute and colorful world of Lineria!

This demo includes a part of the first world, the Shellwood Forest. Explore the town, collect 10 emblems, find countless secrets, and fight some peculiar bosses. Have fun!
name: Renaine Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 and Above
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews:
“The music in each stage grows increasingly more complex, exploring various musical styles with work from different artists, creating a richer sound that grows more intricate alongside the levels.”
Silicon Era

“There's certainly more to Renaine's platforming than meets the eye”
PC Gamer

“It’s a very impressive game with a vibrant, secret-filled game world that’s a joy to explore... A super stylish and feature packed adventure we highly recommend checking out.”
Alpha Beta Gamer
short_description: A fast paced platformer inspired by fighting games, pull stylish combos as you guide Aine, the Phoenix Knight, on her eternal quest to save the cute and colorful world of Lineria!
